title: Can someone explain to me why you think ARURF is better?
body:
Other than complaining about how enemy team has "broken champions" This is urf, not ranked. Who the fuck cares if you win or lose if you're playing a champion you enjoy? Why are you so focused on what other people pick and not focused on how you can have fun yourself?

When you can:
Ban them
Play them
Deal with it
Win anyway

Not every game has the same champions. If you say that its the same 5 champions every game, you're blatantly lying. 

I'd rather not suffer and get stomped for 20 minutes because I got a champion that either sucks or is simply not fun to me.

Can't even experiment different champions because of this shit. 
If I wanted my games decided by a lottery draw I'll go play aram.

replies.body:
I enjoy it, getting random champs beats seeing the same ones nonstop
Edit: Go play aram then, dont cry about something your not forced to play, tons of people enjoy it, you just seem upset because you dont get to play the same champ over and over again

> [{quoted}](name=Master0fMetal,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QwOGlqHL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-04T17:04:18.095+0000)
>
> I enjoy it, getting random champs beats seeing the same ones nonstop
> Edit: Go play aram then, dont cry about something your not forced to play, tons of people enjoy it, you just seem upset because you dont get to play the same champ over and over again

Except I just said I want to experiment. Where did u get "I want to play the same champ over and over" from?

You don't see the same champions nonstop. You're just thinking you do. I bet if you go look at your urf match history, it fucking isn't the same. Go check. 

Stop bullshitting
No need to be an angry douchebag boy, i was simply stating your crying about something you can simply avoid.

So you make stuff up and hope it makes sense? ok
seems pretty simple
And you swear at people for no reason

wow a curse!!! And it wasn't even directed at you!!! sorry your feelings are extremely hurt!
lmfao please grow up, stay on topic, or just give up. Because you're literally bringing zero substance to this thread
And yet, you continue to respond, and swearing in general for no reason just makes you seem pretty toxic

Are you like 5? You still going on about how someone said fuck? It's not the end of the world
People who demonize cursing are hilarious

I don't get what me responding to you has to do with you not having any valuable information to bring, so keep at it. You're a good source of comedy
Hey i appreciate that buddy, im here to amuse you

Go buy more champions and stop being broke. Solves 99% of your problem. Go make friends too so you aren't so lonely, solves 99% of your problem.

Overall you're just a toxic person who hates others for having fun when you simply can't. Keep ranking and leave AR URF to us who wants to have fun.


Bye!

How does anything you have said even matter to the post?


you look like you just skimmed through it and just randomly type something down lmao

> [{quoted}](name=BlueBunny,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QwOGlqHL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-04T17:13:01.468+0000)
>
> Go buy more champions and stop being broke. Solves 99% of your problem. Go make friends too so you aren't so lonely, solves 99% of your problem.
> 
> Overall you're just a toxic person who hates others for having fun when you simply can't. Keep ranking and leave AR URF to us who wants to have fun.
> 
> 
> Bye!

1) I have all the champions
2) I play with a premade almost every game
3) I rarely play ranked 

Bye! More bullshit from another ARURF supporter!

i guess the most glaring pro would be that OP champs in URF don't get instapicked on both sides. The biggest con however is also this lack of choice. Imagine being sent into the midlane as mordekaiser vs ryze..... in URF.... {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QwOGlqHL,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-04T16:58:19.902+0000)
>
> Other than complaining about how enemy team has &quot;broken champions&quot; This is urf, not ranked. Who the fuck cares if you win or lose if you&#039;re playing a champion you enjoy? 
> 
> When you can:
> Ban them
> Play them
> Deal with it
> Win anyway
> 
> Not every game has the same champions. If you say that its the same 5 champions every game, you&#039;re blatantly lying. 
> 
> I&#039;d rather not suffer and get stomped for 20 minutes because I got a champion that either sucks or is simply not fun to me.
> 
> Can&#039;t even experiment different champions because of this shit. 
> If I wanted my games decided by a lottery draw I&#039;ll go play aram.

Really what has stopped ARURF from being perfect is the last of proper 'ALL RANDOM', its kind of weird i could go 3 matches in a row yet see a niche of specific champions at what feels like a 100% pull rate from a small pool of them.

Seriously its sickening to see {{champion:35}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:432}} and etc. where i see them atleast 3+ matches easily, sometimes in a row and by some wierd bad 'match making luck' often on the enemy team but rarely on my team. Where it makes me wonder how many of those people are actually running aram accounts with only 1 to 5 specific champions unlocked and nothing else. Granted i can understand some people would priortize runes over champions or so on, but even in ARAM, this feels like a unfair and broken trick to easily pull 'strong' champions at a 50% or higher grab rate all the time. 

Its definitely not fun when a Xin'Zhao thats running a pure speed build and likely rushed his attack speed% bonus so in a mode like URF he could constantly have 2+ attacks per second so he can just chain stun you with his 15% armor shred passive and knock up, even in regular mode this seems unfair thanks to his 'reduce cooldown schmick' he can pull.

So the point is: ARURF could be alot better where they could get the majority of players to be forced to 'suck it up' and play 'full on retard fun mode' and less of some 'math game' to always pull the 'never can be soloed against champions all the time type of champions'.

-Set it to everyone rolls from the entire pool of champions.
-Remove rerolls.
-Apply it to ARAM, ARURF, Nemesis draft games and everything else that will be a AR system.
-Enjoy the rage the ARAM only spammers throw out as they are forced to place actual matches in regular mode then.

Lots of problems solved then.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

All random simply isn't fun. People have ARAM only accounts, you're basically seeing the "same 5 champs" in ARURF too because everyone can reroll until they get one. 

You literally can't experiment because it's all random. There's a lot more stomps because one team will always have the worse champs..

People that love ARURF are the same people who focus on what other people do, instead of trying to have fun themselves. Selfish people basically.

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QwOGlqHL,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-03-04T17:19:02.743+0000)

this

> -Enjoy the rage the ARAM only spammers throw out as they are forced to place actual matches in regular mode then.

 The biggest problem that would be solved if you did this whould be anyone playing and the new problem would be 25+ minutes que times

They think ARURF is better because their main 1-2 champions are not as absurdly OP in URF as the top 90 champions are, so they need to wreck everyone else's fun by making their picks playable since people can't complain that they got it randomly assigned.

The whole "meta" argument is BS when Riot has also said the popular picks aren't the ones who win a lot.
The whole "same champions every game" argument is BS when there are at least 50 if not 97 (by my count) champions that can comfortably compete with just about anyone in URF.
Exactly. The "OP" picks were in the middle, if not close to the lowest in win rate. Their pick rates were also not all that high.
what I do is feed Dodge and destroy the game for the other nine players I have a lot of accounts so I can do this over and over I really ruin the experience for the others because random is cancer
What a fucking cry baby. Get a life. Noone cares that you dont like arurf

because people like u totally didn't complain when regular urf was out.
i'm not agreeing with him, but you're wrong too.
